long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bulk Message Sender for wa is a powerful browser extension designed specifically for users of WhatsApp Web. This tool enhances your messaging efficiency by allowing you to send bulk messages and utilize various other useful features. Whether you need to send rich text messages, emojis, or attachments, this extension provides a seamless experience. It even supports the pre-editing and saving of message templates, making your communication more streamlined and effective.

Key Features:
This WA Bulk Message Sender extension offers an array of functionalities to make your WhatsApp Web experience smoother and more productive. The extension supports bulk messaging, allowing you to send messages to multiple recipients at once with the capability of rich text and emojis. You can pre-edit and save message templates for quick and easy sending. Additionally, the extension includes a message preview feature that lets you check the format before sending, and you can even send messages to yourself to see the effect.

Another standout feature is the ability to export group contacts to a CSV file, making contact management more efficient. Moreover, the extension supports sending various attachments, including images, videos, documents, and polls, ensuring you can convey your message most effectively.

How to Use:
Step 1: Access WhatsApp Web
- Visit [WhatsApp Web](https://web.whatsapp.com/).

Step 2: extension Interface
- A "Send" button will appear above the right-side chat window. Click this button to open the extension's main interface.

Step 3: Main Interface Operations
- Sender: Bulk Messaging Feature
  - Upload recipient phone numbers (supports Excel and CSV formats; download a template if needed).
  - Set the message content, preview it, and send it. (attachments, including images, videos, documents, and polls.)
- Message Templates: Template Editing Feature
  - Edit and save message templates for quick selection during sending.
- Export: Export Interface
  - Export group contacts to save as a CSV file.
- Settings: Settings Interface
  - Set the interval between messages.

Bulk Message Sender for wa significantly increases your message-sending efficiency, making it particularly useful for users who need to communicate with large groups. The intuitive interface ensures ease of use, allowing you to quickly get up to speed with its features. Most importantly, the extension adheres to a strict data privacy protection policy, ensuring that your data stays local and secure.

Data Privacy Policy:
Your data remains exclusively on your local machine, ensuring privacy and security. It never passes through our servers, so you can use the extension with confidence knowing that your information is safe and secure.

Disclaimer
This extension is an independently developed product by ExtensionsBox and has no association with WhatsApp LLC.
